body_html:
probably it's clearer to have

  • torch.add(input, other, out=None)
  • torch.add(input, value, out=None)
  • torch.add(input, value, other, out=None)

or modify the definition of value for the first variation. Instead of restricting it to Number, allow it to be Tensor as well.
body_text:
probably it's clearer to have

torch.add(input, other, out=None)
torch.add(input, value, out=None)
torch.add(input, value, other, out=None)

or modify the definition of value for the first variation. Instead of restricting it to Number, allow it to be Tensor as well.
body:
probably it's clearer to have

* `torch.add(input, other, out=None)`
* `torch.add(input, value, out=None)`
* `torch.add(input, value, other, out=None)`

or modify the definition of `value` for the first variation. Instead of restricting it to `Number`, allow it to be `Tensor` as well.
